name: gsumwcl
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, cword(c2))), wcel(co(c0, cgsu, c1), c2))

stmt.origin: sylan(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, cword(c2)), wcel(co(c0, cgsu, c1), c2), wcel(c2, cfv(csubmnd, c0)))
stmt.pretty: sylan(c0 ∈ Mnd, c1 ∈ Word(c2), (c0[gsum]c1)∈ c2, c2 ∈(SubMnd ` c0))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, cword(c2))), wcel(co(c0, cgsu, c1), c2))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c2, cfv(csubmnd, c0)))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c2, cfv(csubmnd, c0)), wcel(c1, cword(c2))), wcel(co(c0, cgsu, c1), c2))
body.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ Mnd ∧ c1 ∈ Word(c2))→(c0[gsum]c1)∈ c2)
⊣ (c0 ∈ Mnd → c2 ∈(SubMnd ` c0))
⊣ ((c2 ∈(SubMnd ` c0)∧ c1 ∈ Word(c2))→(c0[gsum]c1)∈ c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, cword(c2))), wcel(co(c0, cgsu, c1), c2))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c2, cfv(csubmnd, c0)))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c2, cfv(csubmnd, c0)), wcel(c1, cword(c2))), wcel(co(c0, cgsu, c1), c2))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ Mnd ∧ c1 ∈ Word(c2))→(c0[gsum]c1)∈ c2)
⊣ (c0 ∈ Mnd → c2 ∈(SubMnd ` c0))
⊣ ((c2 ∈(SubMnd ` c0)∧ c1 ∈ Word(c2))→(c0[gsum]c1)∈ c2)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c2, cfv(csubmnd, c0)))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, cword(c2))), wcel(co(c0, cgsu, c1), c2))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c2, cfv(csubmnd, c0)), wcel(c1, cword(c2))), wcel(co(c0, cgsu, c1), c2))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ Mnd ∧ c1 ∈ Word(c2))→(c0[gsum]c1)∈ c2)
⊣ ((c2 ∈(SubMnd ` c0)∧ c1 ∈ Word(c2))→(c0[gsum]c1)∈ c2)
⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c2, cfv(csubmnd, c0)), wcel(c1, cword(c2))), wcel(co(c0, cgsu, c1), c2))
